text.div:
Vibriosis (Tests for Vibrionaceae species [except Toxigenic Vibrio cholera O1 and O139] by Culture and Identification Method)

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://loinc.org
    Code Display
    6578-9 Vibrio sp identified in Blood by Organism specific culture
    6579-7 Vibrio sp identified in Stool by Organism specific culture
    6581-3 Vibrio sp identified in Unspecified specimen by Organism specific culture
